page.title: 10HOUSES
page.content: {HOUSES There are two historical houses in the area.One is called Whittinghame house and belonged to the Balfour family and was the home of the former Prime minister, Arthur Balfour.In more recent years it was a large private school for boys and employed many local people. For the last two years it has been unoccupied which is very sad because it is a beautiful house. The second house is Ruchlaw House which is built in the Scots baronial style.It was once the home of James Bridie, the Scottish author and is now occupied by David Gilmour another author who recently moved to the area. It is a family home.Some murals have been uncovered recently in one room. They are about the Jacobite risings. The family were secret sympathisers.
